Sentencas: In this work, it was aimed to synthesize and characterize rare earth metal-free cerium-based electrolytes that might be used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) by doping calcium, strontium, or magnesium to CeO2.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: For this purpose, CeO2, CaxCe(1-x)O(2-delta) (0.16 <= x <= 0.24), SrxCe(1-x)O(2-delta) (0.02 <= x <= 0.08) and MgxCe(1-x)O(2-delta) (0.07 <= x <= 0.13) were prepared by using citrate-nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: The solubility limits, microstructural and physical properties of the samples were characterized with XRD, SEM, TG-DTA and impedance analysis.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: It was found that all samples were in fluorite structure similar to the undoped ceria.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: The solubility limits of Ca2+, Sr2+ and Mg2+ were 21%, 6% and 12% (by mole) respectively based on XRD analysis results.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: The relative densities of sintered pellets at 1400 degrees C were more than 90%.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analysis, in which the ionic conductivities of the samples were measured, revealed that the Ca0.2Ce0.8O2-delta (CCO20) sample sintered at 1400 degrees C showed the highest ionic conductivity value of 4.47 x10(-2) S.cm(-1) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: It was determined that the O2- ion conductivity decreased with the order of Ca2+ approximate to Sr2+ >> Mg2+.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: Conductivities increased with increasing dopant ratio, reached a maximum below the ratios of solubility limits, and then decreased.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: The obtained results showed that Ca or Sr doped electrolytes prepared by the citrate-nitrate method can show ionic conductivities close to the state-of-the-art Sm doped Ceria electrolytes.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration

Sentencas: It has been determined that Mg doping is quite ineffective.
Titulo: Ca, Sr or Mg-doped Ceria Electrolytes Prepared by Citrate-Nitrate Combustion Synthesis: Effect of Doping Concentration
